## REST\_MIDDLEWARES\_ORDER variable

Injection token used for injecting array of rest middleware types that defines order of rest middlewares

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
REST_MIDDLEWARES_ORDER: InjectionToken<Type<RestMiddleware>[]>
```
